attributes.action: Make sanitary products free everywhere in public and in stores
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do this because so many girls and women live in poverty and sanitary products cost so much when they are a necessity to all women who have periods. So many girls have to miss out on things like education, and socialising because they don't have enough money to pay for period protection and have to use unpleasant alternatives like socks or toilet roll! Nobody should go through this so that's why all period protection in shops and in public places should be free!
attributes.background: I want the government/parliament to make sanitary products free to use for all girls and women in public places and shops so period poverty can end for everyone!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
